text:
MedTech Exchange, Inc. | Atlanta, GA | ONSITE

We are a small, but growing healthcare IT company based in Atlanta, Georgia. Weâ€™re looking for developers who are passionate about making fast, scalable, and well-designed web interfaces for the healthcare industry. You will be utilizing the latest web technologies to solve challenging problems, create innovative web applications from the ground up and understand exactly what it takes to create an outrageously good user experience while driving down the costs of health care. As a member of the team you'll be designing and developing new user interfaces as well as supporting our existing systems. As an early hire, you'll have the chance to build new product and shape the culture of our company as we grow.

We're looking for serious developers on both the front-end and server-side (Java, Play Framework, Scala, Angular 2) -- people with some professional experience (3 years or more) to join our team right now and be, or grow into, technical leaders in short order.

Interested? Send your resume to hiring@medtechexchange.com
